abstract: Following through on what he said he would do, Attorney General Andrew Cuomo of New York on Monday sent a letter to Bank of America seeking information on bonuses paid out to its employees and those of Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Following through on what he said he would do, Attorney General Andrew Cuomo of New York on Monday sent a letter to Bank of America seeking information on bonuses paid out to its employees and those of Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Cuomo, Frank Demand BofA Bonus Data
